episodes.title: Blackfyre Rebellions: Part 6 - The Golden Company
episodes.summary:
Steven Attewell returns, we discuss the 3rd and 4th Blackfyre Rebellions, the Golden Company, and a lot more Bittersteel.

Find Steven at: https://racefortheironthrone.wordpress.com/

Our new show Fandomedia is at http://fandomedia.reviews

episodes.title: Dreams & Dreamers Q&A
episodes.summary: Answering all the burning (and freezing) questions sent us regarding the last episode. Make sure to check out our new podcast at fandomedia.reviews

episodes.title: Dreams & Dreamers (mild TWoW spoilers)
episodes.summary: An episode dedicated to all kinds of dreams, whether mundane or magical. Green dreams, wolf dreams, dragon dreams, dreams of guilt, fever dreams... Send any questions for the Q&A follow-up to westeroshistory@gmail.com

episodes.title: Bonus: A Hymn for Spring
episodes.summary: Ashaya and Aziz are joined by Amin from A Podcast of Ice and Fire to discuss Tower of the Hand's A Hymn for Spring book that we all contributed to. Also in this episode, Aziz covers "The Rains of Castamere" on classical guitar.

episodes.title: Great Empire of the Dawn & Asshai Live Q&A Chat
episodes.summary: Aziz is re-joined by LmL for a live discussion! We took questions prior to the episode, and several more from live commenters. The episode was recorded Sat, Oct. 22nd 2016.

episodes.title: The Great Empire of the Dawn
episodes.summary:
The Long Night, Azor Ahai, Strange Stone, Dragonlords, the Amethyst Empiress & ancient bloodlines. This joint episode w/Mythical Astronomy of Ice & Fire has it all!

Check out LmL's show at: lucifermeanslightbringer.com

episodes.title: Blackfyre Rebellions: Part 5 - Bittersteel
episodes.summary: The Blackfyre series returns! This time: the life of Aegor Rivers, aka Bittersteel. Aziz also does a Grandpa Simpson impression.

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter: The Forsaken
episodes.summary: We were among the first on the planet to hear this chapter, and it's safe to say: we're taken by the "The Forsaken"!

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: Live S6 Book Reader Wrap Up
episodes.summary: We're joined by Radio Westeros, Tony Teflon, Michal Schick and Lucifer Means Lightbringer to close out what's been a great Season 6.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6 Show Only Live Q&A Blowout
episodes.summary: Sean and Aziz took questions live on July 4th to close out Season 6!

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E10 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: The HoW and RW teams are back to break down the amazing S6 finale!!

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E10 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: Aziz and Sean geek out and analyze the amazing Season 6 Finale.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6 Book to Show LIVE Q&A
episodes.summary: Ashaya, Aziz, Lady Gwyn and yolkboy took questions live on 6/23, and a great time was had by all.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E09 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: Ashaya, Aziz, Lady Gwyn and yolkboy discuss what's possibly the most epic episode of TV ever made!

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E09 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: Sean & Aziz discuss "The Battle of the Bastards" one of the most epic and ambitious episodes of TV ever filmed.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E08 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: Lady Gwyn, yolkboy and Aziz discuss "No One" and take stabs at how the season might end.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E08 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: Sean and Aziz chat about "No One" while wondering how to get one of those badass Fire-catapult ships for themselves.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E07 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: Lady Gwyn and Aziz break down "The Broken Man"... hey, that's repetitive!

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E07 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: He's back! He's back?! *HE'S* back?! Sean & Aziz discuss "Broken Men".

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E06 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: All 4 members are back for a discussion on "Blood of My Blood". There's also a bonus chat on Balticon 50, which we all attended, and heard GRRM read a brand new chapter from TWOW.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E06 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: Aziz & Sean test out Blood of My Blood to see what type it is. We break down the visions and the return of several key characters!

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: Mid-Season 6 Q&A (Live!)
episodes.summary: Sean and Aziz took questions and gave... answers! Imagine that. Season 6 has been a big hit so far, and the questions sent in are excellent as well.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E05 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: Aziz and Lady Gwyn discuss The Door, an episode that has greater implications for the future (and past!) of ASOIAF than perhaps any episode to date.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E05 - Show Only Review (Live)
episodes.summary: This episode was recorded live, and is as long as Longy Longerson (from Longville)... but the hype stays strong the whole time...A huge episode deserves a huge response! It's our usual "enthusiasm married to analysis" combo done live and with extra length (gotta make up for Theon and Varys somehow).

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E04 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: Lady Gwyn, yolkboy and Aziz analyze Book of the Stranger, looking for connections to the books, and offering a few theories...

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E04 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: Sean & Aziz discuss Book of the Stranger, after checking all fire exits.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E03 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: Aziz, Lady Gwyn & yolkboy discuss Oathbreaker, focusing on ramifications for the books. None of us stab each other in the back during the recording of this episode.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E03 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: Sean and Aziz break no oaths while discussing "Oathbreaker".

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E02 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: Ashaya, Aziz, Lady Gwyn and yolkboy discuss Home, one of the most popular Game of Thrones episodes of all time!

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E02 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: Sean and Aziz discuss the episode called Home, from their home.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E01 - Book to Show
episodes.summary: Aziz and the Radio Westeros team take a look at The Red Woman, while avoiding mirrors.

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S6E01 - Show Only Review
episodes.summary: Aziz (book reader, small beard) and Sean (non-book reader, large beard) give their thoughts on The Red Woman, the first episode of Season 6. There are no book spoilers in our Show Only Reviews. (Plenty of book spoilers in our Book to Show reviews!)

episodes.title: Aziz vs. ADwD Epilogue
episodes.summary: Aziz breaks down the final chapter in A Dance with Dragons!

episodes.title: Live Season 6 Preview Book to Show Q&A
episodes.summary: Aziz & Ashaya are rejoined by the Radio Westeros team to take questions on the uncharted territory that is Season 6 of HBO's Game of Thrones. For book readers!

episodes.title: Game of Thrones Season 6: Preview & Trailer Discussion
episodes.summary:
Sean of House Beard returns to help get you excited for Season 6. He and Aziz break down the trailers and casting news while making a few predictions along the way.

Make sure to leave a rating, thanks!

episodes.title: Asshai-by-the-Shadow
episodes.summary: A look at this most ancient of cities, the legend of Azor Ahai, and the origin of dragons. With special guest LmL!

episodes.title: Dark Sister
episodes.summary: An episode dedicated to the "career" of Dark Sister, the Valyrian steel blade of House Targaryen. Famous owners and top kills!

episodes.title: House Dayne: Part 2 - History and Lore
episodes.summary: Aziz and special guest Lucifer Means Lightbringer discuss the mystical and ancient side of House Dayne. Dawn (is it Lightbringer?), Sword of the Morning (who decides?), the castles of Starfall and High Hermitage... and plenty more!

episodes.title: Live ASOIAF Q&A #2 - The Winds of Winter (GoT spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya and Aziz took questions on The Winds of Winter live on YouTube on January 16th. Enjoy!

episodes.title: House Dayne: Part 1 - Characters
episodes.summary: Aziz & Ashaya break down the major characters from House Dayne. Theories, background and predictions!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: House Royce (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz delivers a sermon on House Royce, the ancient bronze clad stalwarts of the Vale. Included are connections to House Stark, Ser Waymar the ranger from the prologue, and Lord Bronze Yohn who has his hands full with Littlefinger.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Blackfyre Rebellions: Part 4 - The Battle of Redgrass Field
episodes.summary:
Aziz is joined by guests Steven Attewell (Race for the Iron Throne) and Jim McGeehin (Wars and Politics of Ice and Fire) to recap and explain one of the largest battles in the history of Westeros. 

The Red Dragon vs. the Black Dragon, winner takes the Iron Throne!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Live ASOIAF Q&A #1 - Anything Goes
episodes.summary: Aziz & Ashaya answer questions! Some were received ahead of time, giving us a chance to prepare a bit, others we answered on the fly. YouTube contains the unedited footage, this is the edited version.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Blackfyre Rebellions: Part 3 - Daemon Blackfyre
episodes.summary: Aziz is joined by returning guest Steven Attewell (Race for the Iron Throne) to discuss the legendary Daemon Blackfyre. The man, the myth, the sword, the rivalries, the immense popularity. Comparisons to Robert and Renly Baratheon, Aemon the Dragonknight and more are included. The most Daemon-tastic episode of all time!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Shadow of Summerhall: Aerys & Rhaegar (spoilers)
episodes.summary: This episode delves deep into Aerys, Rhaegar and other characters who were impacted by Summerhall. There's talk of how the Mad King could wreak havoc on the Seven Kingdoms even now...
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Tragedy of Summerhall
episodes.summary: Ashaya and Aziz delve deep into the mysteries of Summerhall. What went wrong, who caused it, prophecies, dragon eggs, death and destruction... this episode has it all.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5 Awards Show & S6 Casting News w/guests (TWoW spoilers)
episodes.summary: An all-star lineup has been assembled to decide the best and worst moments of Season 5. Aziz and Ashaya are joined by Lady Gwyn and yolkboy of Radio Westeros, Tony Teflon of Teflon TV, Stefan Sasse of Nerdstream Era and Boiled Leather Audio Hour and Steve Mangiameli the FriggenItalian!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: Season 5 Show Only Q&A Wrap Up (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Sean and Aziz finish up season 5 by taking questions and looking at the season as a whole. No one was burned during the recording of this episode.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E10 - Book to Show (TWoW spoilers)
episodes.summary: Aziz, Lady Gwyn and yolkboy were LIVE and taking questions for this final episode of Season 5!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E10 Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Shame. Shame. Shame. On you, if you miss this episode. Sean & Aziz break down the epic conclusion to Season 5.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E09 - Book to Show (TWoW spoilers)
episodes.summary: Aziz, Lady Gwyn and yolkboy discuss "the Dance of Dragons" live with listeners.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E09 - Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Sean of House Beard & Aziz of House Sadface recorded this episode filled burning people live on YouTube. No one was burned during OUR filming, and it was a bit nippy!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E08 - Book to Show (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Go hard or go home, but don't go Hardhome! But do check out this review, we have quite a lot to say (shocking, we know). Aziz is joined by Radio Westeros' Lady Gwyn and yolkboy. Ice magic, Night's King, Valyrian steel... We discuss it all!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E08 - Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Sean and Aziz vs the epic and awesome Hardhome! Seven hells, what an episode this was!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E07 - Book to Show (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Aziz discusses The Gift with Lady Gwyn and yolkboy of Radio Westeros. At the end of the episode, they discuss season 6 casting news and the preview for next week, for those interested and those specifically disinterested!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter: Vale Preview Chapter (mega spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya & Aziz devour this chapter as if it were a 12 foot tall lemon cake threatened by a pimply gingerlad.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E07 - Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: "The Gift" was quite an episode! Quite possibly the biggest episode of the season so far, with huge implications and major developments. Bring your copy of The Seven Pointed Star and watch. House Beard is represented again by Sean and his Unsullied perspectives, while Aziz steers the ship.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E06 - Book to Show (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya, Aziz & yolkboy are Unbowed, Unbent and Unbroken by Season 5, episode 6. This week features more than the usual amount of watchener questions and comments, a discussion on the controversy, and many deep parallels with the books. Some are quite unexpected...
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E06 - Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Sean of House Beard and Aziz of House History cannot be smelled from 5 miles away, but can they find a cock merchant? Guess again. We review this controversial episode that has both major highs and major lows.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E05 - Book to Show (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Aziz and Ashaya are joined again by yolkboy of Radio Westeros for a fun discussion of Kill the Boy. Sorry, there are no winklepickers in this episode, but there is a Strong Belwas joke. Also, there are lots of thoughts on Sansa, Ramsay, Stannis vs. Roose, Jon and Aemon, greyscale and the Doom of Valyria.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E05 - Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: The halfway point is here and the buildup to what's looking like what will be an epic second half is almost complete. Sean and Aziz talk Valyria, greyscale, dragons, and a new set of characters to be worried about.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E04 - Book to Show (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Sons of the Harpy is one of the most talked about episodes since the Red Wedding. Ashaya and Aziz are again joined by the Radio Westeros team to discuss a heroic death, several uprisings, and the reveal of a long awaited mystery. Also, winklepickers.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E04 - Show Only Review (mild spoilers)
episodes.summary:
Warning - there is significant R+L = J chatter in this episode. If you don't know what that phrase means, you might not want to listen to the 2nd half of this podcast.

The buzz around this episode seemingly makes it one of the most important to date. A ton of history, backstory, plot exposition and action are present in Sons of the Harpy and Sean and Aziz have a blast breaking it down in detail.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E03 - Book to Show (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Aziz is joined by Radio Westeros' yolkboy and Lady Gwyn for a detailed, fun discussion about High Sparrow. We pick the characters we think are most likely to die, and a surprise choice from Cersei as her Hand of the King... There's so much to talk about as always, and we're excited to share it with you!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E03 - Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Sean and Aziz break down the very subtle High Sparrow. Themes of identity, service and revenge are discussed, as well as several mysteries and motivations.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E02 - Book to Show (spoilers)
episodes.summary: The early part of Season 5 continues with The House of Black & White, an episode full of spectacular scenery, clever dialogue and several developing mysteries. We are veering further into uncharted territory as the show continues to grow apart from the books. Ashaya and Aziz are joined by Lady Gwyn and yolkboy of Radio Westeros for a discussion featuring lots of predictions, comparisons to the books, and of course, bad jokes.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E02 - Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz and Sean discuss episode 2 of Game of Thrones, The House of Black and White. Listeners caught up on the book series can check out our Book to Show Discussion episodes as well.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E01 - Book to Show (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya returns and is joined by guest yolkboy from Radio Westeros. Season 5 is a different experience for book readers, as major divergences are expected. Here in our discussion on episode one, we compare it to the books, and note all the changes we could find. There are quite a few, some good, some not so good, and some we'll have to wait and see on...
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: S5E01 - Show Only Review (spoiler free)
episodes.summary:
While so many major plots came to an end in Season 4, so many new plots are just getting started here in Season 5. Sean and Aziz are back with a no frills, high content break down for episode 1. We discuss every location and plotline featured in the episode, making sense of it all while pointing to things you might have missed...

This episode is dedicated to the show, with very little mention of the books at all. For book-to-show reviews, check out our "Season 5 for Book Readers" episodes.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: Season 5 Preview & Trailer Discussion (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Season 5 is upon us! Sean of House Beard is still "Growing Long" and he's back with us to chat about the upcoming episodes. We analyze the trailers and every plotline, making predictions and guesses while also introducing some of the new cast and characters. This season we'll see some heavy departure from the books, so keeping track is even more important!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Blackfyre Rebellions: Part 2 - Daeron II the Good
episodes.summary: The son of Aegon the Unworthy had a lot to deal with after his father's deathbed decree. Guest Steven Attewell joins Aziz in discussing this monarch, and whether or not he actually deserved to be called "the Good". Special attention paid to the Great Bastards, Baelor Breakspear, and Dorne.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Heresies of Septon Barth
episodes.summary: A detailed look at the life, times and works of the man who knows the most about the "higher mysteries". If you want to learn more about dragons, ravens, or why the seasons are so crazy, you do not want to miss this episode on Septon Barth. He's the leading expert in all of A Song of Ice and Fire on those topics and quite a few more!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Blackfyre Rebellions: Part 1 - Aegon the Unworthy
episodes.summary: This episode covers the life of Aegon IV the Unworthy, the man who fathered the Blackfyre Rebellions. A King who used the Iron Throne to serve his needs, caring little for the realm. He made life miserable for his sister Naerys and brother Aemon the Dragonknight while siring Bittersteel, Bloodraven, Shiera Seastar and Daemon Blackfyre himself.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Religion & Magic: Part 4 - Night's King (spoilers)
episodes.summary: This is a spoiler filled episode that discusses the legendary Night's King of the Night's Watch.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Doom of Valyria (mild spoilers)
episodes.summary: A look at The Doom of Valyria, a mysterious cataclysm that destroyed what may have been the greatest civilization to ever exist.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Book Discussion: World of Ice and Fire Overview (spoilers)
episodes.summary: In this discussion episode, we give our first impressions of The World of Ice and Fire. We discuss all of the immediate revelations, and the latter half of the episode contains discoveries more related to the 'current events' of the series.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter: The Battle of Ice Part 3 (mega spoilers)
episodes.summary: History of Westeros continues our series on the upcoming Battle of Ice, which will be early in The Winds of Winter! We are again joined by Jeff Hartline (BryndenBFish of Wars and Politics of Ice and Fire), who was in the first two parts as well. This is the final part of this series, and then we are on to World of Ice and Fire content!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter: The Battle of Ice Part 2 (mega spoilers)
episodes.summary: History of Westeros continues our series on the upcoming Battle of Ice, which will be early in The Winds of Winter! We are again joined by Jeff Hartline (BryndenBFish of Wars and Politics of Ice & Fire), who was in part 1 as well. This is part two of a three part series.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter: The Battle of Ice (mega spoilers)
episodes.summary:
Ashaya and Aziz are joined by guest Jeff Hartline (Wars and Politics of ASOIAF blog) for this 3 part series on The Battle of Ice.

Part 1 is dedicated to unraveling the complex political situation in the North. There are Houses with compelled loyalty secretly plotting revenge, while loyal armies face the winds of winter. Each house of note is discussed, as well as the key players.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E10 Part 2 (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Return to the Iron Couch for HoW's final TV discussion episode of the year. Ashaya and Aziz discuss many spoiler topics, including what we might see next season, differences from book to show and what those changes mean. After such a major episode, of course there is a lot to praise and a lot to criticize!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E10 Part 1 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Sean & Aziz analyze the final installment of season 4, a conclusion full of surprises, deaths, and surprise deaths. The longest of the season, The Children is an episode that lives up to its title in so many ways, some very subtle, some throwing fireballs.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E09 Part 2 (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Aziz and Ashaya's spoiler-filled discussion of S04E09. We also discuss some casting news and leaks.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E09 Part 1 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz and Sean break down and analyze the exciting Watchers on the Wall, the penultimate episode of season 4. This is the most expensive Game of Thrones episode to date, and likely one of the most expensive episodes of TV ever made, period. So of course, we have plenty to say.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E08 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Ashaya, Sean, and Aziz discuss The Mountain and the Viper. Yes, both of them! Several other characters are discussed as well. There are several scenes in this episode that are enhanced by intense analysis, while others really speak for themselves. Head back to the Iron Couch for another Game of Thrones breakdown.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E07 Part 2 (spoilers)
episodes.summary: History of Westeros continues discussing S04E07 with a short spoiler-filled episode. The very end of the episode contains discussion of the previews for the next episode.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E07 Part 1 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: History of Westeros discusses Mockingbird. This episode is spoiler free, part 2 contains our spoilery discussion.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E06 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: The History of Westeros TV discussion team returns to the Iron Couch for another thorough discussion. As usual, there is discussion of spoilers and previews from next week's episode at the end of the episode.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E05 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Return to the Iron Couch with Ashaya, Sean & Aziz as they analyze S04E05, First of His Name. The major reveal is thoroughly analyzed, and there is discussion of some spoiler topics at the end of the episode, after the credits. There are several more of Sean's unspoiled predictions as well as discussion of some things you might have missed...
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E04 Part 2 (spoilers)
episodes.summary: With all the new information, several theories need addressing. This companion episode allows us to talk spoilers apart from the normal book spoiler-free TV discussions.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E04 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: A groundbreaking episode that left show viewers and book readers alike scratching their heads. If you want to make some sense of what the heck you just saw, you've come to the right place.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E03 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz and Sean break down the transitional and controversial episode 3 of Game of Thrones season 4. The discussion revolves around power dynamics, likable characters doing unlikable things, and how initial reactions can evolve quite a bit after gaining some perspective. As always, we illuminate the backstory and explain the subtleties, keeping you prepared for the next episode and beyond!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E02 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary:
Ashaya and Aziz are again joined by Sean Pink, aka Sean of House Beard. Sean's Unsullied (hasn't read the books) opinions are a great contrast to our thorough book knowledge.

As with the last episode, we spend a few minutes after the credits discussing spoilers. So if you've already read the books, stick around for that!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: TV Discussion: Game of Thrones S04E01 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz and Ashaya are joined by Sean, an Unsullied show viewer who has many interesting opinions to share. He was also in our Red Wedding episode! The last five minutes or so of the episode contain spoilers for the books and The Winds of Winter
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Religion & Magic: Part 3 - Weirwood Tour (spoilers)
episodes.summary:
The episode features themes of blood and ancestry, as weirwoods tend to be inextricably tied to the surrounding area, both physically and culturally. Given the broad scope of this topic, quite a variety of related subjects come up. Heart tree-murdering Melisandre makes an appearance or two, the Wall is discussed as well as several members of House Stark and some very out of the way places youÃ?Â¢??ve barely heard of.

We go from Beyond the Wall to the far south, considering not just where the weirwoods are, but where they might have been in the past. Given that there are so many places left unseen in the story, we make educated guesses where other trees might be. This isnÃ?Â¢??t just about where the trees are, thoughÃ?Â¢?Ã?Â¦ The absence of weirwoods can be as conspicuous as the most grotesque Heart Tree face.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter: Mercy Preview Chapter (mega-spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya and Aziz analyze an amazing new chapter as of 3.26.14, one that is both dark and satisfying. Spoilers abound.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Religion & Magic: Part 2 - Weirwoods (spoilers)
episodes.summary: A deep look into the bloody eyes and mouths of the Heart Trees. Are the trees a conduit of the Old Gods or are the trees themselves the Old Gods? Bran's chapters give us endless clues, but there are also hidden references elsewhere. We bring it all together and break it all down.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Religion & Magic: Part 1 - The Comet (spoilers)
episodes.summary: History of Westeros new series on Religion & Magic kicks off with the great comet, a sign interpreted by many and seen by all. Was it sent by the gods or is it a sign that magic and dragons have returned? Whatever the meaning, there will be blood and fire. Ashaya and Aziz give an overview of what to expect in the series while asking a bunch of tough questions. Particular attention is paid to parallels between various supernatural elements found throughout the books.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Hellhorn (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya & Aziz use some very mild TWoW spoilers to get at a full description of Dragonbinder, the horn with Valyrian glyphs that sounds like hell but can supposedly control dragons. No mortal man shall sound it and live.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter: The Battle of Fire (mega-spoilers)
episodes.summary:
Ashaya & Aziz go deep into unreleased material from tWoW! 

A huge battle is about to occur where several POV characters have converged. We break down the relevant spoiler chapters while detailing each of the participants' motivations and expectations for the conflict. Theories, predictions and plenty of action from the battle itself!

To donate to History of Westeros podcast: http://bit.ly/1cA7FdN
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Wit & Wisdom of Stannis Baratheon (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya and Aziz delve into the humor and background of Stannis Baratheon, our pick for the funniest character in the series. Listening to this episode will not cause the loss of any fingertips, and we will swear to that, but we cannot be held responsible for any shadow-baby related mishaps.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: The Isle of Skagos (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya and Aziz discuss the infamous and mysterious island of Skagos. The Stoneborn are perhaps the most ancient and isolated human culture in Westeros. Through the Skagosi we see glimpses of what the North was like eons ago. Along the way there is discussion of cannibals, unicorns, 'dead things in the water', and a certain young Stark boy.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Plots: The Riverlands Part 3 (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Ashaya and Aziz wrap up the Riverlands series and discuss what's happening through A Dance With Dragons.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: History: The Riverlands Part 2 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Steve and Aziz continue their analysis with part 2 of the History of the Riverlands. This episode covers the time period starting just after Aegon's Conquest and ending with the Red Wedding. Steve's final episode as a host.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Game of Thrones: The Red Wedding (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: This week, Aziz and Steve are joined by Ashaya and TV viewer Sean Pink to discuss (and decompress a bit) the episode "Rains of Castamere" (S3, Episode 9).
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: History: The Riverlands Part 1 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: A discussion about the families, geography and important events that helped shape the Riverlands. Focusing mainly on the distant past.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: History: The Kingsguard (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz, Ashaya and Steve discuss the history and intricacies of the noble Kingsguard!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Plots: Varys & Illyrio Part 2 (spoilers)
episodes.summary: Aziz, Steve and Ashaya explain what Varys & Illyrio are up to through the end of A Dance With Dragons.

episodes.title: History: Varys & Illyrio Part 1 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz, Steve and Ashaya go in depth on Illyrio Mopatis and Varys the eunuch, discussing their relationship while delving into some of their early plots.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: History: Clegane, Payne, Cassel, Mormont, Tarly (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: This week Aziz and Steve are joined by the infamous Larry Williams of OtakuAssemble. We discuss some of the minor houses that help push the overall story. Lots of character analysis.
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire

episodes.title: Plots: Oldtown & The Citadel (spoilers)
episodes.summary: An analysis of Oldtown and the Maesters through A Dance With Dragons.

episodes.title: History: Oldtown & The Citadel (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz, Steve & Ashaya discuss Westeros' oldest city, which is also the home of the Maesters.

episodes.title: The Winds of Winter: Dornish Preview Chapter (mega-spoilers)
episodes.summary: A thorough analysis of one of the early release chapters from The Winds of Winter.

episodes.title: History/Plots: House Frey (1st half spoiler free)

episodes.title: History: House Tyrell Part 1 (spoiler free)

episodes.title: Analysis: The Lands of Ice & Fire
episodes.summary: Steve and Aziz go through each of the maps in the "Lands of Ice & Fire" map collection.

episodes.summary: Steve & Aziz analyze the situation at the Wall at the end of A Dance With Dragons.

episodes.title: History: The Night's Watch Part 1 (spoiler free)
episodes.summary: Aziz and Steve discuss the history of the Night's Watch... from its inception, through various conflicts and Lord Commanders and other notable events. This will include everything up through A Clash of Kings!
tags: A Song of Ice and Fire
